events.message: The customer reported an auto accident that occurred on April 30th involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the initial report of a collision involving the insured vehicle.
An agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to manage the customer's case and assist with the process.
Acknowledgement was sent to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and outlining the next steps.
Customer was requested to provide a police report, photos of the vehicle damages, and repair estimates to proceed with the claim.
The customer submitted all required documents including the police report and several photos documenting the damage sustained.
Investigation into the collision details and liability was initiated based on submitted evidence and statements.
The investigation concluded that the insured was not at fault in the auto accident after reviewing all documents and testimonies.
A settlement proposal was sent to the customer covering repair costs and rental car reimbursement for the damaged vehicle.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the communication and support.
The claim was officially approved following acceptance of the settlement offer and confirmation of all required paperwork.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued to the customer’s designated account without delay.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed after payment issuance and confirmation that the customer’s concerns were addressed.
All documentation and records related to this auto accident claim were securely archived for future reference.
